obfuscation: ﻿I was watching a program on television the other day ( which is very unusual actually , I am not very found of such ) and I were lucky to see Monty Python .
original: ﻿I was watching a program on television the other day (which is very unusual actually, I am not very found of such) and I was lucky to see Monty Python.

obfuscation: I was lucky because it is one of my favourite programs , but on the other hand I was very unlucky , or more correctly , I got very unlucky as I realized that my English comprehension were very poor , not very poor , but still quite bad .
original: I was lucky because it is one of my favourite programs, but on the other hand I was very unlucky, or more correctly, I got very unlucky as I realized that my English comprehension was very poor, not very poor, but still quite bad.

obfuscation: I began to count the years I have spent with my dear English books through my time at school , and I get it to ten years .
original: I started to count the years I have spent with my dear English books through my time at school, and I get it to ten years.

obfuscation: It is a rather retentive time and still there is much to learn .
original: It is a rather long time and still there is much to learn.

obfuscation: Whereas I did not spend a longer period in an English speaking state I might find it hard to find the `` every-day-words '' that are so useful for the coherence in a language and in order to make it sound natural and relaxed to a native English speaking person .
original: Whereas I did not spend a longer period in an English speaking country I might find it hard to find the "every-day-words" that are so useful for the coherence in a language and in order to make it sound natural and relaxed to a native English speaking person.

obfuscation: I have lived in Italy for three days and I started the other way around , which means I started to speak , and after I studied the language .
original: I have lived in Italy for three years and I started the other way around, which means I started to speak, and after I studied the language.

obfuscation: I really do not know which of the two is the best way , but I can not deny that making an experience in the area is very useful and a fast way of learning .
original: I really do not know which of the two is the best way, but I cannot deny that making an experience in the country is very useful and a fast way of learning.

obfuscation: As Swedish normally make , I point out my vulnerable spots .
original: As Swedish normally do, I point out my vulnerable spots.

obfuscation: But I know that I am not shy and I do n't mind making a fool of myself .
original: But I know that I am not shy and I don't mind making a fool of myself.

obfuscation: In any speech I have learnt I have always been very eager to try my wings .
original: In any language I have learnt I have always been very eager to try my wings.

obfuscation: I found reading very interesting from different degree of views , first because I am interested in literature and second because I want to acquire and increase my vocabulary , and I find reading an appropriate way to do that .
original: I found reading very interesting from different point of views, first because I am interested in literature and second because I want to acquire and increase my vocabulary, and I find reading an appropriate way to do that.

obfuscation: I have lived abroad for five years , and even though I did not stay , as I previously mentioned , in an English speaking state , still I have had the opportunity to practice the language and hopefully improved my speaking skills .
original: I have lived abroad for five years, and even though I did not stay, as I previously mentioned, in an English speaking country, still I have had the opportunity to practice the language and hopefully improved my speaking skills.

obfuscation: I master the language and the grammar , at least the basic grammar since I did not study English for a retentive time .
original: I master the language and the grammar, at least the basic grammar since I did not study English for a long time.

obfuscation: I study Italian on C-level this semester and I find it helpful to compare and exchange differences in the speeches and make comparative philology , sometimes it helps you and other times it overturns you .
original: I study Italian on C-level this semester and I find it helpful to compare and exchange differences in the languages and make comparative philology, sometimes it helps you and other times it overturns you.

obfuscation: The word `` people '' , for instance is considered as plural in English , while in Italian `` gente '' is singular , thus , I have to pay attention to matters like that .
original: The word "people", for instance is considered as plural in English, while in Italian "gente" is singular, so, I have to pay attention to matters like that.

obfuscation: I know it is a disadvantage not watching television that improves ones comprehension skills .
original: I know it is a disadvantage not watching television that improves ones comprehension skills.

obfuscation: It is positive that we do not dub the movies , it is extremely good for improving your understanding and I think it is a great advantage that we have in Sweden and I have defended our system many times in Europe .
original: It is positive that we do not dub the films, it is extremely good for improving your understanding and I think it is a great advantage that we have in Sweden and I have defended our system many times in Europe.

obfuscation: I feel , though , that I would want a refreshment in grammar and the structure of the language .
original: I feel, though, that I would need a refreshment in grammar and the structure of the language.

obfuscation: I have been working in Florence for three days and we were working mainly with American clients and that was a crises for me , because the Americans did not understand my British English , or let 's say , they had difficulties in catching what I said , so , I sort of `` converted '' to American English during my time in Italy .
original: I have been working in Florence for three years and we were working mainly with American clients and that was a crises for me, because the Americans did not understand my British English, or let's say, they had difficulties in catching what I said, so, I sort of "converted" to American English during my time in Italy.

obfuscation: When I decided to take the A-course in English I got confused because I did not know weather to speak American English or British English .
original: When I decided to take the A-course in English I got confused because I did not know weather to speak American English or British English.

obfuscation: Soon I found away that it was not of major importance but anyhow I decided to stick to my British English , the important thing , after all , is to be consistent .
original: Soon I found out that it was not of major importance but anyhow I decided to stick to my British English, the important thing, after all, is to be consistent.

obfuscation: This course appears to be very well constructed and I have high expectations on myself .
original: This course seems to be very well constructed and I have high expectations on myself.

obfuscation: I want to improve my knowledge and skills in many ways , mainly the grammatical structure but also my writing and the means to express myself in a correct manner .
original: I want to improve my knowledge and skills in many ways, mainly the grammatical structure but also my writing and the way to express myself in a correct manner.

obfuscation: Not only because I want to understand everything they say in Monty Python , but also for my future job-position where my English will be highly helpful .
original: Not only because I want to understand everything they say in Monty Python, but also for my future job-position where my English will be extremely helpful.
